Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Beckman Coulter AU480 automated clinical analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LZI Oxycodone III Enzyme Immunoassay for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of oxycodone in human urine using enzyme immunoassay on automated clinical chemistry analyzers.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for qualitative and semi-quantitative determination of oxycodone in human urine at cutoff values of 100 ng/mL and 300 ng/mL, for prescription use with automated clinical chemistry analyzers; provides preliminary analytical result requiring confirmation by alternative chemical methods.
